name: dynamodb-dashboard
description: DynamoDB Dashboard is a web UI for visualizing and inspecting AWS DynamoDB tables. It helps developers browse items, run queries, and understand data structures without relying solely on the AWS console.
features: Table browsing: View all DynamoDB tables in your AWS account with item counts and key schema information.
Item inspection: Browse table contents with pagination and view individual items with all attributes displayed.
Query builder: Construct queries using partition and sort keys with filter expressions for targeted data retrieval.
Scan operations: Perform full table scans with optional filters to explore data without predefined access patterns.
JSON formatting: Display item data in readable JSON format for easier analysis of complex nested structures.
AWS credential support: Connect using IAM roles, access keys, or environment variables for flexible authentication.
Local development: Test against DynamoDB Local or production tables from a unified interface during development.
Lightweight deployment: Run as a simple web application without heavy dependencies or complex setup requirements.
